Hey  even I really like Money Tap’s service. It gave me the Freedom of choosing EMI tenure option at the time of borrowing

I’ve been using this app for around 3 years now. This is an excellent money management app. Helps in keeping track of my expenses, categorizes my expenses, helps me draw comparison across months, tracks recurrent payments, notifies me of upcoming bills, tax advice and so on…In this time and age where we make payments on multiple online and offline sites, Walnut presents a composite picture of our financial health and money management, a required app for everyone
My vote is also with Niyo! It comes with the IDFC first Bank account with a whopping 7% interest rate on Savings and Zero Commissions on Investments. This helps me save more and invest even more
My votes for Kotak 811. Thay have Superior Customer Service: Everything can be done in the app. All the service requests also can be raised on the App. No need to call customer care

It has to be Niyo. Unbelievably low exchange rates. I am surprised by the exchange rates provided by this card that are far better than any other forex cards that I explored before my trip. Plus fund transfer and withdrawal are super easy

Hands down its Paytm. It’s a pretty good app. About two years I’ve downloaded Paytm, from then I’ve never kept money in my pocket. Moreover its so widely used in every small shop in my hometown that my parents have also started using it (especially after the COVID situation
I agree with  and  Nothing can beat Niyo’s WhatsApp support and the swift and instant response in case of any issue

I have been a fan of Slice since it has: Quick and hassle-free customer support. Extremely User-friendly Convenient to get money in your account. No processing fee or subscriptions like a dozen applications out there I have not once received any problem while repaying or borrowing from Slice
Slice is the best app ever made for students as no bank gives loan or credit to students. I am using this app from last 4 years and I am totally satisfied with the support offered by the company
I am a huge spender and tracking becomes tough with online spending. I never knew when you’ve crossed the budget. Walnut helped me with that

I absolutely love the way Kotak has made its way into my life. The application is so smooth and modern. The first step in the path of building wealth is knowing what your outflows are, analyse them and finally being able to reduce them. This app does exactly that! You get to see all your expenses in one place, categorised too so that you know where you need to cut. Monthly tracking of expenses helps you get that gratifying experience of seeing your efforts work and where you can improve. Absolutely love it

Before 2017, I used four different banks to cater to different purposes. But when I opened 811 account, I got way better services wrt all the other banks and thus I dropped them for Kotak 811. So try it until we get Jupiter in our hands

title: Federal Bank Not allowing Change of Communication Address

posts.text: Hi, I have a Jupiter account and I needed to change the communication address since I have moved cities, I looked into the app to change the address but there is no option, so I contacted Jupiter Helpdesk, they said address change is currently not possible. Hence today I went to Federal Bank, Andheri East to change my communication address since Jupiter is using Federal Banking services for the saving bank. I was told my Federal Bank that address change is not available for Jupiter account holders, it can only be done for Federal Saving Accounts, we need to contact Jupiter for that, I said Jupiter told me there is no such option with them, I was told by the Federal Bank employee that sorry it is not possible to change the address. I have searched this community for similar topics and have found countless topics opened for the same issue, I don’t understand how a basic feature like address change not available in the app, you have time for features like Pots and Pans but a basic feature like Address Change is not possible for you ? I will unfortunately not be able to use your world class bank app since this simple feature not being available becomes a deterrent, tomorrow if there is some financial issue operating your app, and you ask for identification documents, you will deny solution stating the address do not match with the documents provided and with the address available with your bank. I will be left in a problematic situation. I would like to also suggest other customers not to invest/save your hard earned money in this app, you never know what sort of problems you could face if a simple address change feature is not available, your money could get stuck for good
I asked Jupiter support to update my address. The response I basically got was, “Why do you have to do that? It’s okay, we won’t send you anything
The lack of response from anyone from the bank to my post, also shows the level of interest they have in solving this issue

I’ve just realized this issue for both Jupiter and Fi. Seems like neobanks really are just that; neobanks. Can’t use them reliably. Really disappointing that a simple address change is not possible. It’s baffling that in more than 2 years, Jupiter never thought to add the address change option. Saying ‘limitations at our partner bank’ is just an excuse
